mapper.select: select USER_UID as userUid, ID_PHIEU_MUON as idPhieuMuon, STATUS as status, EXTENDED_TIMES as extended_times, CREATED_DATE as createdDate, BORROW_DATE as borrowDate, RETURN_DATE_ESTIMATE as returnDateEstimate, RETURN_UPDATE_REAL as returnUpdateReal, FINE as fine, CANCEL_DATE as cancelDate from PHIEUMUON where ID_PHIEU_MUON = #{idPhieuMuon}

SELECT DS.*, SM.BOOK_ID as book_id FROM SACHMUON AS SM JOIN PHIEUMUON AS PM ON SM.ID_PHIEU_MUON = PM.ID_PHIEU_MUON JOIN SACH AS S ON SM.BOOK_ID = S.BOOK_ID JOIN DAUSACH AS DS ON S.BOOK_CODE = DS.BOOK_CODE WHERE PM.ID_PHIEU_MUON = #{idPhieuMuon};
select BOOK_ID from SACHMUON where ID_PHIEU_MUON = #{idPhieuMuon};
